A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars films of the entire series. This challenged patriarchal norms and gung-ho reckless men\, as well as bringing us a deeper understanding of the Force. It has some excellent character development and the concluding scenes are divine in message and cinematography. This film deconstructs some of what came before in a way that clearly upsets some people but which truly marks it amongst the greats of the entire series.
